Name: Sprint
Challenge: Player round must take less than X * 30 seconds, where X is # of players

Name: Perfect
Challenge: Players take no damage during combat

Name: Pinned
Challenge: Players only use card abilities

Name: Marathon
Challenge: Players use at least 1 non-card action per turn

Name: Distanced
Challenge: Players only make attacks at range greater than 5 ft

Name: Grit
Challenge: Players use no heals

Name: Brawl
Challenge: Players only deal damage with unarmed attacks

Name: Spent
Challenge: Each player must have exhausted 3 cards

Name: Reserve
Challenge: Each player must exhaust no cards

Name: Sacrifice
Challenge: At least one player must be downed

Name: Personal
Challenge: Players only make attacks at range 5 ft or less

Name: Confirmed
Challenge: Final blows on enemies must exceed their remaining health points

Name: Persuade
Challenge: Convince any combatant to stop fighting

Name: Poisoned
Challenge: Each player takes 1 damage at start of their turn

Name: Buffed
Challenge: Enemies add 1d4 to their attack rolls

Name: Handicapped
Challenge: Each player can't lose more than half their max HP rounded up

Name: Extended
Challenge: All enemy attack's range are increased by 5ft

Name: Heavy
Challenge: Player's can't move more than 15 ft per round

Name: Exhausted
Challenge: Cannot return cards from discard

Name: Belated
Challenge: Deal no damage to enemies in the first round

Name: Train
Challenge: Movement must be made in a straight line

Name: Ditch
Challenge: Each player must use 1 consumable

Name: Sore
Challenge: Each time a player deals damage, they take 1 damage

Name: Sun-Blindness
Challenge: Whenever a player ends movement outside of a shadow/darkness, all their attack value is reduced by 2

Name: Recharge
Challenge: when players deal damage in one round, they must not deal damage in the subsequent round

Name: Together
Challenge: Each player must end their turn within 15 ft of another player

Name: Warped
Challenge: Enemies gain a 10 ft. teleport they can use once per turn

Name: Duplication
Challenge: 2 enemies player's choose will be cloned (or one enemy will be cloned twice, if only one enemy exists)

Name: Half-Life
Challenge: Player's Active card effects must not persist beyond half their usual time rounded up

Name: Weakness
Challenge: Whenever damage from player is dealt, deal half damage roudned up instead

Name: Clown
Challenge: Clown added to battlefield. Cannot be hurt, moves 15 ft and plays a trick each round
Each time a card is played, instead of going to discard/exhaust/hand, it is replaced with a randomly chosen card from the player's deck
